1.title: Inside Out
1.plot: Kathy and Chantal want a kitchen inspired by the great outdoors. Eager to please, Neil and Jay moved the stove out onto the deck, brought astro turf and brought the barbeque in. Now the girls can enjoy cooking outdoors and indoors.

2.title: The Newlyweds
2.plot: Craig and Victoria want a space where they can entertain friends and family. Neil and Jay give them a lounge straight out of the 70's. Now Craig and Victoria can kick it old school in this disco style room, complete with a disco ball.

3.title: We Love to Party
3.plot: Lisa and Tim are a fun, energetic couple who don't take life too seriously. It's up to Neil and Jay to transform their basement into the ultimate kids playground complete with a ball pit, and a romper room floor.

4.title: Our First Home
4.plot: Lisa and Adam want a French Country inspired bedroom. Neil and Jay embrace 17th century style to make a room Luis XIV would envy. Complete with burgundy wallpaper, huge drapery and an over the top headboard to leave this couple speechless.

5.title: A Hunting We Will Go
5.plot: Adrienne and Dan want to create a relaxing retreat. Inspired by the existing wood paneling, the guys construct the ultimate hunting lodge.

6.title: Condo Nightmare
6.plot: Stylish sisters Melissa and Samantha have requested an edgy design in their new condo. Neil and Jay design the ultimate "Addams Family" gothic re-creation. Will the girls be thrilled or terrified?

7.title: Checkmate
7.plot: Jennifer and Michael want a little more closet space. Neil and Jay take it to the next level as they build right into the middle of the room. With some other fun tricks up their sleeves, this couple's in for the ride of their lives.

8.title: Slumber Party
8.plot: Neil and Jay are creating the ultimate girls room. YIKES. But they have a different take on what a girl's room is: nail painting, dolls and pink, pink, pink.

9.title: Split Personality
9.plot: Michelle has her heart set on making Lou's man cave a space they both can enjoy. Leave it to Neil and Jay to literally split this room down the middle for double the enjoyment.

10.title: Fun House
10.plot: Tade and Andre are a hip couple that want a fun, sexy bedroom. The trouble begins when Neil and Jay hear the word fun. This bedroom will be converted into the ultimate Pee Wee Herman Fun House for this couple to let loose in.

11.title: Silver Screen
11.plot: Janny and Keith want a great place where they can entertain friends and watch movies. Neil and Jay take this couple on a cinematic adventure and give them a large screen TV complete with theatre style seating.

12.title: Man Space
12.plot: David and Susanna have enlisted The Fix to renovate their basement. Since most of the house reflects Susanna's taste Neil and Jay convert the space into the ultimate man's space for David.

13.title: Music Room
13.plot: Cam and Gosia are musicians who met while working on a cruise ship. Neil and Jay will create a Norwegian inspired room to house their instruments, but large instrument boxes and shoddy nautical décor will surely sink this ship fast.

14.title: The Palace
14.plot: Girly girl Cynthia has made the mistake and used the word pretty in her plans. White wonderland gone bad is what this couple will get. Not so masculine for Andrew, but dainty enough for his princess.

15.title: Paradise Island
15.plot: Matthew and Carla want a space to relax and entertain. So Neil and Jay give them an island oasis, straight from the Caribbean. Who wouldn't want an instant vacation on their 3rd floor?

16.title: Modern Madness
16.plot: Sophisticated couple, Steve and Linda want to modernize their basement. So the guys deck out the space with white vinyl furniture, foil paper accents and a splash of bright orange.

17.title: Cubicle Living
17.plot: Dawn and Frank want to transform their open concept main floor into a more defined space. After a little creative planning, Neil and Jay build this growing family a few tiny rooms that will give them the definition they are looking for.

18.title: Bonus Room
18.plot: Practical couple Dan and Cindy are looking to make their spare room more functional but when Neil and Jay get in there they install a murphy bed that doubles as a bookshelf. This room will be anything but practical.

19.title: Ultra Organized
19.plot: Lara is firmly believes in a place for everything and everything in its place. The boys go the extra mile and raise their bed six feet off the ground. Boxes, labels and shelves will keep this couple organized from floor to ceiling.

20.title: Zen Room
20.plot: Ross and Raquel are no strangers to the Reno TV World. With one great experience under their belt, they thought they would try it again. When the boys create a zen lilac hell "Serenity now" will be the last thing on this couple's mind.

21.title: Tree House
21.plot: Naturalists Sid and Jodi want to unearth their outdated bedroom. Naturally, Neil and Jay take things too far and turn this bedroom into a forest complete with live trees, shrubs, linoleum grass tiles and a swinging hammock.

22.title: Hacienda
22.plot: Clark and Michael are a quirky couple looking to give their den a face lift. Jay and Neil create a Mexican villa complete with sombreros and salsa, leaving the homeowners feeling hot, hot, hot with fury. Olé.

23.title: Animal House
23.plot: Shari and Ira want to create an animal friendly space. Complete with a giant litter box, grass and a few extra critters, this space is every pet's dream. How will Shari and Ira react when they see that their room has become doggy daycare?

24.title: Miami Beach
24.plot: Derek and Jared work in the travel industry and are desperate for an escape of their own. Neil and Jay fill the backyard with sand, sun and fun. Unfortunately the flamingo covered space isn't exactly their idea of a walk on the beach.

25.title: Two Faced
25.plot: Kevin and Alison want a new designed living and dining area. Kevin is a fan of big, bright colours while Alison's taste is more toned down. Neil and Jay design a completely reversible room to suit both their tastes.

26.title: Barn House
26.plot: Mother and daughter Lydia and Natalie want their basement to have an "antiquey" feel. Neil and Jay turn back the hands of time and take this basement back to basics - spinning wheel and all.

imdb.title: The Fix
synopsis:
Its time Reno TV got Punkd!The Fix is Candid Camera meets Face Lift in this reno-ridiculous half hour of comedy meets
craftsmanship for HGTV. Each week, irreverent and infectiously funny Brit contractors Jay Purvis (Kitchen
Equipped) and Neil Davies (Real Renos) prey on hapless homeowners who think theyre getting a free TV
makeover, only to be fixed with some of the most absurd reno and decor ideas ever imagined.The Fix is a chance for these two talented craftsmen to ditch their measuring tapes and have some fun at their clients expense, showing us just how bad a reno can go, with priceless results. We watch the entire process as Jay and Neil scheme to deliver the ultimate practical joke, with someone elses house! In each episode, one story is introduced, the homeowners hopes and dreams for a makeover of a room in their home are explored, and then their worst nightmares are revealed to them by Jay, Neil and their evil crew. As the homeowners reveal their true feelings about the absurd transformation, our tireless pranksters keep straight-faced as long as possible, describing and defending their pièce de résistance, until the homeowner is finally informed Youve been fixed, messed with, this is all a joke!After the fake room is revealed, and some CPR administered, all is forgiven (we hope!) and our guys make it all right - fixing the mistakes, and pulling off the nasty finishings, revealing the beautiful space our good-sport
homeowners were hoping for. The homeowners are ushered back into the space for the real reveal and after hugs and kisses, its on to the next victim, er, homeownerThe 26 half hour episodes of season one will be as visually unique as the concept itself. Super-8 home movie
style treatments will be used for family b-roll and the shooting style throughout will be hand-held, fast and
immediate. The Fix will be peppered throughout with an infectious modern musical style keeping the entire feel fresh, fun and cool.The Fix is a daring and hilarious experiment in home reno TV, and shows us just how far two seemingly honest, skilled contractors will go for a really good laugh at their clients expense.
